experiences.title: Marketing Dev Squad Tech Lead
experiences.generalDescription: Responsible to Develop and Implement the complex Features. Leading and Accompanying the team members with providing solution plan, design, architecture, development, and documentation. alongside code reviewing and team members' technical training and growth. the team leader's replacement in his absence

projectsAndTasks.Dynamic funnels: Designing, Modelling, and Templating the Sign-Up process into a dynamic funnel sign-up system, allowing the company to create and deliver new complex funnels quickly and easily
projectsAndTasks.Funnel validation: Developing a form/input wrapper that extended the validation, state management, and data syncing
projectsAndTasks.Client Side performance: Developing and refactoring pages/components, expanding the design system, chunk splitting and lazy loading, resulted with higher "PageSpeed Insights" score.
projectsAndTasks.Automation and System: Migrating the internal Marketing Email Automation System to HubSpot’s CRM Automation and developing Neo4J to HubSpot’s data syncing
projectsAndTasks.Databases: Expanding schemas, Managing data structures, and the efficiency of the calculated fields

experiences.title: Sustaining Team member
experiences.generalDescription: Code Refactoring, Features and bug fixes implementation for all the legacy products of the company

projectsAndTasks.Refactor, Fixes and Feature implementati: Hot swap redundancy Data back-up and restore mechanism improvements, Refactoring the Network devices ACL management system
projectsAndTasks.PT and CVE Research: Development of security related fixes, Java deserialization, Database permissions, Race conditions, Server-side/Client-side vulnerabilities

experiences.title: Central software team member
experiences.generalDescription: Central software team member - Central software code development and algorithm integration

projectsAndTasks.Navigation algorithms Integration: Development of navigation algorithm wrapper, that integrated the Navigation algorithm with the central software and connect it with the hardware (IMU, Servo Motors, Cameras)
projectsAndTasks.Testing, Debugging and validation: Implementation of Unittest, On hardware debugging and validation of the software
